author: dennisl
msg: o Use released 3.x version of maven-site-plugin for use with Maven 3.

author: dennisl
msg: o Add temporary redirects to allow for easily changeable links between versions 2 and 3 of Maven Site Plugin. 2.x currently goes to the standard plugin site and 3.x goes to the wiki.

author: mgrigorov
msg: Do not throw exception for HeaderResponse listeners during Ajax request processing.
Log a debug message and ignore the call.

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2576: simplify IndexWriter's private startCommit method now that it's single thread'd (may fix this intermittent test failure); also add one missing checkpoint() in addIndexes
